actions.name: Anticipation

cost.trigger: The user is targeted with an Attack that has a Base Power of 100 or more (after the X-Strike roll to determine number of hits), or an Attack that would be super effective against it.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is targeted with an Attack that has a Base Power of 100 or more (after the X-Strike roll to determine number of hits), or an Attack that would be super effective against it.

Effect: The user is treated as having +4 EVA against the triggering Attack.
